neighbors.name: Union Operating Co LLC
neighbors.claims: Union Operating Co LLC is an Illinois limited liability company listed as the owner of farm parcels in McHenry County, specifically along West Grant Highway [McHenry County Meeting Portal](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=135471). In March 2024, the entity was listed as the owner of record on a zoning petition filed by Clear Channel Outdoor, LLC for billboard improvements on their property, indicating commercial leasing activity beyond simple land holding [McHenry County Zoning Petition](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=135471). The LLC's principals are not explicitly listed in the zoning documents, which defer to the lessee's representatives [McHenry County Meeting Portal](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=135471).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner with commercial interests (billboards); no evidence of broader political influence found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach as a commercial landlord; entity has demonstrated willingness to lease land for commercial infrastructure (billboards).

neighbors.profile_summary: Private LLC owning land along Grant Highway; recently engaged in billboard leasing deals.

citations.claim: Union Operating Co LLC is an Illinois limited liability company listed as the owner of farm parcels in McHenry County, specifically along West Grant Highway
citations.title: McHenry County Zoning Board of Appeals Packet - March 2024

citations.claim: In March 2024, the entity was listed as the owner of record on a zoning petition filed by Clear Channel Outdoor, LLC for billboard improvements on their property
citations.title: McHenry County Zoning Board of Appeals Packet - March 2024

neighbors.name: McHenry County Conservation District
neighbors.claims: McHenry County Conservation District (MCCD) is a local government agency that manages over 25,000 acres of open space and farmland for conservation [McHenry County Government](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=131352). The District actively participates in zoning hearings for renewable energy projects; for example, during the Pebble Solar Farm hearings in 2024, MCCD requested specific conditions including increased setbacks and the preservation of a remnant oak woodland [McHenry County ZBA Minutes](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/Meeting.aspx?Id=5facd99e-d45a-468a-a911-6e3a4284c687&Agenda=PostMinutes&lang=English). MCCD has also received grants for land acquisition and restoration, such as a $223,500 grant to protect 40 acres in McHenry Township [Daily Herald](https://www.dailyherald.com/20230103/submitted-content/mchenry-county-conservation-district-protects-49-acres-with-illinois-clean-energy-community-foundati/). The agency's stance is driven by ecological impact; they do not strictly oppose solar but advocate for site plans that minimize environmental disruption [McHenry County ZBA Minutes](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/Meeting.aspx?Id=5facd99e-d45a-468a-a911-6e3a4284c687&Agenda=PostMinutes&lang=English).
neighbors.influence_justification: Major landholder and statutory authority on environmental issues; actively influences zoning conditions for development projects.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage MCCD leadership early; proactively offer setbacks and vegetative screening (pollinator habitats) to align with their conservation goals.

neighbors.profile_summary: County conservation authority; actively engages in solar zoning hearings to enforce environmental protections.

citations.claim: The District actively participates in zoning hearings for renewable energy projects; for example, during the Pebble Solar Farm hearings in 2024, MCCD requested specific conditions including increased setbacks and the preservation of a remnant oak woodland
citations.title: McHenry County Zoning Board of Appeals Minutes - April 10, 2024

citations.claim: MCCD has also received grants for land acquisition and restoration, such as a $223,500 grant to protect 40 acres in McHenry Township
citations.title: McHenry County Conservation District protects 49 acres

neighbors.name: West Grant Develop Inc
neighbors.claims: West Grant Development, Inc. is an Illinois corporation identified as the participating landowner for a commercial solar energy facility proposed by OneEnergy Development, LLC [McHenry County ZBA Petition](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=57671). The corporation's officers are listed as James Athans (President), Constantine Athans (Vice President), and David Klesmith (Secretary), with a mailing address in Elkhorn, Wisconsin [McHenry County ZBA Petition](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=131352). The entity owns multiple parcels along West Grant Highway and has actively petitioned for Conditional Use Permits to allow solar development on its property [McHenry County ZBA Petition](https://pub-countyofmchenry.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=57671). The corporation was originally founded by local attorney Donald F. Franz, who served as registered agent until his passing in 2020 [Sigma Chi Newsletter](https://nusigs.squarespace.com/s/Omega-Sig-Newsletter-Feb-2021-Final-r.pdf).
neighbors.influence_justification: Significant landowner and active participant in renewable energy development; partners with major developers (OneEnergy).

approach_recommendations.engage: Entity is already a participating landowner for solar; treat as a supportive peer or potential partner for expansion.

neighbors.profile_summary: Land holding company owned by Wisconsin-based investors; currently leasing land for the OneEnergy solar project.

citations.claim: West Grant Development, Inc. is an Illinois corporation identified as the participating landowner for a commercial solar energy facility proposed by OneEnergy Development, LLC
citations.title: McHenry County ZBA Petition #2018-051

citations.claim: The corporation's officers are listed as James Athans (President), Constantine Athans (Vice President), and David Klesmith (Secretary), with a mailing address in Elkhorn, Wisconsin
citations.title: McHenry County ZBA Legal Notice of Public Hearing

citations.claim: The corporation was originally founded by local attorney Donald F. Franz, who served as registered agent until his passing in 2020
citations.title: Omega Sig Newsletter - Chapter Eternal

neighbors.name: Burma Rd Grain LLC
neighbors.claims: Burma Rd Grain LLC is an Illinois limited liability company associated with agricultural property on Burma Road in Marengo. The entity holds at least one parcel (PIN 11-32-100-019) used for grain cultivation. Public records do not indicate active commercial development projects or political activity for this specific entity.
neighbors.influence_justification: Small agribusiness; no public profile found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage as a standard agricultural neighbor; verify ownership and decision-makers via direct contact.

neighbors.profile_summary: Agricultural entity likely engaged in grain farming.

neighbors.name: John C Tr Et Al Martin
neighbors.claims: John C. Martin is a resident and farmer in the Marengo area of McHenry County. He is a recipient of USDA agricultural subsidies, indicating active involvement in farming operations [EWG Farm Subsidy Database](https://farm.ewg.org/top_recips.php?fips=17111&progcode=total_acre&page=0). The Martin family appears to own multiple agricultural parcels in the vicinity, often listed under individual names or trusts [Starving Farmer Directory](https://www.starvingfarmer.com/county/111/17). No specific public stance on renewable energy development was found for this individual.
neighbors.influence_justification: Local farmer; no evidence of public office or high-profile community leadership.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach as a working farmer; discuss impacts on agricultural operations and potential for lease revenue.

neighbors.profile_summary: Local farmer and trust holder; active in USDA subsidy programs.

citations.claim: He is a recipient of USDA agricultural subsidies, indicating active involvement in farming operations
citations.title: EWG Farm Subsidy Database - McHenry County

citations.claim: The Martin family appears to own multiple agricultural parcels in the vicinity, often listed under individual names or trusts
citations.title: Starving Farmer Directory - McHenry County
